name: Manipulator of Figure 3
description:
Description

Manipulator of Figure 3 - is the third part of the physical puzzle. Your task is to deliver the green circle to the purple platform and hold out for 2 seconds, you can move the dark gray shapes as you wish, but you can only turn the circle either to the right or left every 5 seconds. It also complicates the task that if at some levels the figure touches the spikes below it is destroyed, so you need to act carefully. You have to be smart on some levels so that you can get through them, try new tactics and develop different plans, some simple solutions are not on the surface. Can you complete all the levels?

Features:

- interesting gameplay

- minimalistic picture

- an exciting game with physics

- pleasant music

- various levels
